mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (name, phone, birth_date, to_date, dept_name, position) VALUES (#{name}, #{phone}, #{birthDate}, #{toDate}, #{deptName}, #{position})
INSERT INTO file (file_name, original_file_name, file_type_no, user_no, file_path) VALUES (#{fileName}, #{originalFileName}, #{fileTypeNo}, #{userNo}, #{filePath})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM file WHERE user_no = #{userNo} and file_type_no ='1';
SELECT * FROM file WHERE user_no = #{userNo} and file_type_no ='2';
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET name = #{name}, phone = #{phone}, birth_date = #{birthDate}, to_date = #{toDate}, dept_name = #{deptName}, position = #{position} WHERE user_no = #{userNo}
UPDATE user SET from_date = curdate() WHERE user_no = #{userNo}
